resources.string: The following information has been added to your Wallet and can now be shared.
The following information has been shared with
This information has not been stored.
First you need to activate your Wallet.\n\nActivating is done by connecting the Wallet to your eduID.
The eduID Wallet gives you the ability to securely share your personal educational information.
Use it to share only specific pieces of information at a time.
Withdraw access to your information at any time.
For secure storage of educational information.\n\nReady to share.
This information is available in your wallet
Please add this information to your wallet
First you need to activate your Wallet.\n\nActivating is done by connecting the Wallet to your eduID.

The eduID Wallet gives you the ability to securely share your personal educational information.

• Use it to share only specific pieces of information at a time.
• Withdraw access to your information at any time.
• Some third great USP.
